Title: Denies youthful offender treatment to persons convicted of a class B violent felony offense
Summary: Denies eligibility for youthful offender treatment upon conviction of a class B violent felony, unless the court determines that such person was a minor participant in the crime or that mitigating circumstances exist which bear directly upon the manner in which the crime was committed.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to eligibility for youthful offender status
